subject: Congratulations my dear,
body:
Congratulations my dear,
 
Congratulations for beign the winner of US$200,000,00 Elon Musk , The Twitter Owner's daily Bonanza give away raffle draw which started today Thursday 9th February 2024 . Elon Musk remains the richest person in America, for the second year running. At an estimated $251 billion Elon Musk  has decided to reward 20 persons with $200,000,00 for the New Year as the richest man in the World at the moment We do a daily raffle draw to pick one person to be paid $200,000,00 till the 20 people completely receives their payment of $200,000,00 each before April.28 , 2024, You are one of the beneficiaries , that's why we sent this email to you.
 
NOTE; The US$200,000,00 is your merited Funds from ELON MUSK to you because your E-mail address ( XXXXXX )was generated through the computer ballot system as one of the selected beneficiaries , You are required to buy only a U$300 Apple card - iTunes Card Steam Wallet Card.The ONLY charge you will EVER pay as the true winner before we can send the $200,000,00 to your bank account tomorrow morning.
 
The $300 you will send is mandatory as the real beneficiary of the ELON MUSK New Year bonanza beneficiary . YOU WILL NEVER pay a dime again as agreed and signed here in Court . Congratulations once again.
 
Yours Faithfully ,
Philip Andrew
Phone:+19712005993
Elon Musk Financial Director

subject: Re:   Congratulations my dear,
body:
Hello Philip Andrew,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I'm one of the lucky winners. Elon Musk is indeed a generous man. Can you tell me more about how this raffle draw works? How were my details selected in the computer ballot system?

Also, could you please explain why I need to buy an Apple card or Steam Wallet? Is it some sort of verification process?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Clara

subject: Re: Congratulations my dear,
body:

 The $300.00 you will send is mandatory as the real beneficiary of the ELON MUSK New Year bonanza beneficiary . YOU WILL NEVER pay a dime again as agreed and signed here in Court . Congratulations once again.

Also, could you please explain why I need to buy an Apple card or Steam Wallet? Is it some sort of verification process?

body:

subject: Re: Congratulations my dear,
body:

subject: Re: Congratulations my dear,
body:
Hello Clara,

Thank you for your prompt response. The fee is $500 and it's for the processing of your payment. Once we receive the fee, we will release your payment into your bank account.

Best regards,
Philip Andrew
Elon Musk Financial Director

Hello Philip Andrew,

Thank you for explaining that to me. I'm curious, why is there a fee for processing my payment? Is this a common practice?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
